mapper.select:
SELECT N.STRID AS N_STRID, N.STRTITLE AS N_STRTITLE, N.STRCONT AS N_STRCONT, N.STRTYPE AS N_STRTYPE, N.STRCOUNT AS N_STRCOUNT, F.MAPID AS F_MAPID, F.MAPNAME AS F_MAPNAME, F.MAPCOUNT AS F_MAPCOUNT, F.MAPLOD AS F_MAPLOD, F.MAPTIME AS F_MAPTIME, F.MAPMINN AS F_MAPMINN, F.MAPMAXN AS F_MAPMAXN, F.MAPVER AS F_MAPVER, F.MAPCRT AS F_MAPCRT, F.MAPMANA AS F_MAPMANA, F.STRID AS F_STRID FROM STRUMN N LEFT JOIN STRUMF F ON N.STRID = F.STRID
N.STRTITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWordBar}, '%')
AND F.MAPMINN<=#{headcount} AND F.MAPMAXN>=#{headcount}
AND N.STRTYPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{strtype}, '%')
AND F.MAPLOD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{maplod}, '%')
AND F.MAPMANA LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mapmana}, '%')
AND F.MAPTIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{maptime}, '%')

SELECT N.STRID AS N_STRID, N.STRTITLE AS N_STRTITLE, N.STRCONT AS N_STRCONT, N.STRTYPE AS N_STRTYPE, N.STRCOUNT AS N_STRCOUNT, F.MAPID AS F_MAPID, F.MAPNAME AS F_MAPNAME, F.MAPCOUNT AS F_MAPCOUNT, F.MAPLOD AS F_MAPLOD, F.MAPTIME AS F_MAPTIME, F.MAPMINN AS F_MAPMINN, F.MAPMAXN AS F_MAPMAXN, F.MAPVER AS F_MAPVER, F.MAPCRT AS F_MAPCRT, F.MAPMANA AS F_MAPMANA, F.STRID AS F_STRID FROM STRUMN N LEFT JOIN STRUMF F ON N.STRID = F.STRID WHERE F.MAPID = #{mapid} ORDER BY F.MAPID
